name: DecisionHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask Decision Helper to roll a die.”
”Alexa, ask Decision Helper to flip a coin.”
”Alexa, ask Decision Helper for a random number between 1 and 10.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decision helper
des: Can't make up your mind and just want to leave something up to chance? Let decider help! Throw caution to the wind and ask it to flip a coin, roll a die, or pick a random number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
